name: KIT109 - Exam game (AVeryCreativeUsername)
description:
Woo exams.

Aim and shoot the tank to win.

Levels 6 and 7 are unimplemented.

Credits:

Graphics:

  • Bullets: https://opengameart.org/content/bullets-game-asset by  bevouliin.com.
  • Robot: https://opengameart.org/content/pixel-robot by David Harrington.
  • Guns: https://opengameart.org/content/bows-and-guns-cc0 by SnoopethDuckDuck.
  • Terrain: https://opengameart.org/content/steampunk-level-tileset-mega-pack-level-tileset-16x16 by KnoblePersona.
  • Sky background: https://opengameart.org/content/sky-backdrop By Bart
  • City background: https://opengameart.org/content/city-background-repetitive-2 By Alucard.
  • Enemy: https://opengameart.org/content/open-gunner-expansion-pack-1 by Master484.
  • Explosion: https://opengameart.org/content/explosion-3 by Sogomn
  • Ammo and gameover text backdrop: https://opengameart.org/content/sci-fi-user-interface by Buch.
  • Enemy health bar heart: https://opengameart.org/content/heart-pixel-art by Dansevenstar.
  • Level button UI: https://opengameart.org/content/golden-ui-bigger-than-ever-edition by Buch.
  • Blackhole portal: https://opengameart.org/content/portals by LetargicDev.
  • Shield: https://opengameart.org/content/shield-aura-effect by Sholev.
  • Grenade: https://opengameart.org/content/16x16-grenades by Mtk.

Sound:

  • Shooting, grenade collision, human death sound and explosion sound effects: https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style by SubspaceAudio.
  • Title screen music: https://opengameart.org/content/cyberpunk-moonlight-sonata by Joth.
  • Level music:  https://opengameart.org/content/pack-of-loopable-game-music by Oddrooom

Font:

  • Text for all UI elements: https://www.1001fonts.com/orbitron-font.html by League of Moveable Type
